entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one they are trying to bewitch and extract information from. She is described as sitting in a crowded court.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is trying to leave the Ministry with Ron. He is described as jumping into the lift and pulling off his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who Harry needs to find first before they can work out a way of extracting Hermione from the courtroom. He is described as being soaking-wet and wild-eyed when he gets into the lift.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who has to go down to the courtrooms with Umbridge. She is not present in the lift with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is where Harry and Ron are trying to leave before they are exposed.

entities.name: courtroom
entities.description: The courtroom is where Hermione has to go with Umbridge.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley walks into the lift and talks to an elderly witch.

entities.name: elderly_witch
entities.description: The elderly witch is described as having blonde hair teased so high that it resembles an anthill.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as they are trying to leave the Ministry together.
